mapper.select: select * from review where id=#{id} and del=0

SELECT REV_SEQ, MODEL_ID, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STARPOINT, PHOTO_AF, WDATE, PARENT, DEL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REV_SEQ ASC) AS RNUM, REV_SEQ, MODEL_ID, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STARPOINT, PHOTO_AF, WDATE, PARENT, DEL FROM REVIEW WHERE ID=#{id} AND DEL=0) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end} ORDER BY REV_SEQ ASC

SELECT QNA_SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, ANSWER, ADATE, READCOUNT, PARENT, DEL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QNA_SEQ ASC) AS RNUM, QNA_SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, WDATE, ANSWER, ADATE, READCOUNT, PARENT, DEL FROM QNA WHERE ID=#{id}) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end} ORDER BY QNA_SEQ ASC
